testcase.classname: Find a job on The Economist Jobs Board
testcase.name: Find a job Sector wise
testcase.system-out: Given user is already on Home Page of Jobs..................................passed When user clicks on Sign in link............................................passed Then user enters Sign in details "cool.shailendra@yahoo.com" and "test@123".passed Then user clicks on Sign in button..........................................passed Then user clicks on Find a job link.........................................passed Then user is redirected to the jobs page....................................passed Then user clicks on the Banking and finance sector..........................passed Then user clicks on the each job of that sector.............................passed Then user getting details of that job.......................................passed Then user getting apply button..............................................passed Then Close the browser......................................................passed
